This is the most basic way of building a search engine, it is rudimentary. There are many ways to populate your directory, crawlers, social, meta, you need the first step.
This feature allows for Web Masters to register their site on your engine.
This helps you sort things out, and … helps your users find things fast.
Web Master Registration? What if you can crawl the sites themselves, let the robot do its thing.
Your users can search better now, your reputation rockets!
You spend sometime talking to top Venture firms. Journalists write about you. You get a boost
A web master wants to opt out, why? Why would you not want to be discovered by the best search engine? Some people like this, I guess…
How to make spaghetti?' No , I do not want to buy the thing I want cook it!
Increasing the visibility of your search. You just invented Search Engine Marketing
Pretty straight forward, ads = money, but reputation doesn't change.
It is new, it is sexy, it is a… programming language
You can store more, more storage, means more indexing.
Better Indexing, faster time, you are not an amateur anymore.
Crawling is the foundation of your data.
Users do things, this analyzes what they do, you get smarter.
You hire a gangsta rapper and have an ice sculpture, people love it.
It is a search bar, on your desktop, it searches straight from your desktop. That is it.
If we can make it, we should rank it, people like to measure… things.
At last you have a new data center to use and play with.
Building up your foundation. Nice! More storage, means more indexing.
Okay are you ready for this, there is no turning back now. This new Indexer takes more power to cool then to run.
Crawling more and faster, because you have to feed the beast.
